## RumGlobal.startView property

Start a view manually. Enable to manual start a view, use `trackViewsManually: true` init parameter and call `startView()` to create RUM views and be aligned with how youâ€™ve defined them in your SPA application routing.

        (name?: string): void;
        (options: ViewOptions): void;
    };
